Posts.Content: Apr 19, 2009 11:03PM - edited Apr 19, 2009 11:04PM by gale1220 Hi Alicia,  So sorry you are having acid reflux.  I am a five year survivor and I too had a lot of trouble with the acid reflux and I still do but they told me it was caused from my chemo so I have learned to live with it by taking Zantac daily and it does seem to help.   Good Luck with yours.
Posts.Title: Sore in throat that won't heal Alicia gale1220
